title: Bacon Wrapped Chicken Kebabs
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons soy sauce', '4 tablespoons cider vinegar', '2 tablespoons honey', '2 tablespoons rapeseed oil', '10 large mushrooms, cut in half', '2 spring onions, finely chopped', '3 skinless, chicken breast fillets, cut into chunks', '225g thick-cut streaky bacon, cut in half', '1/2 (432g) tin pineapple chunks, drained', '8 skewers']
